summary.para: Returns a topology for a media source that builds an internal topology.

param.name: pPresentationDescriptor
param.para: A pointer to the interface of the media source's presentation descriptor. To get this pointer, either call on the media source, or get the pointer from the MENewPresentation event.

param.name: ppTopology
param.para: Receives a pointer to the topology's interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: Invalid argument. For example, a NULL input parameter, or the presentation descriptor is not valid.

summary.para: Enables an application to get a topology from the sequencer source. This interface is exposed by the sequencer source object.
